name: PSP Mario - The New Worlds
short_description:
A clone of the original Super Mario Bros from the nintendo entertainment system. The purpose of the project is mainly a bit of fun to-do after such a long time, but i do indeed hope that this can or will be used for educational purposes by someone, somewhere. 

The game's source code is currently undergoing a major revamp, as i haven't touched it in a few years, i have learnt a great deal in that time and hopefully will be able to get the game back up and running and working even better than before!

For more information on myself if you'd like to know more that is, my game company alias is 369 Studio; 
www.369studio.net
